Tool

NameIdentity
ID19
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2003-13

Description

Calculates the geometric intersection between both layers and adds the difference of layer A less layer B. Uses the free and open source software library Clipper created by Angus Johnson. Clipper Homepage Clipper at SourceForge

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Layer A Shapes (input)A
Layer B Shapes (input)B
Output
IdentityShapes (output)RESULT
Options
Split PartsBooleanSPLITSet true if you want multipart polygons to become separate polygons.Default: 1
